CURRENCY.name: Copper Coin
CURRENCY.description: A basic copper coin, the smallest unit of standard currency.

CURRENCY.name: Silver Coin
CURRENCY.description: A silver coin, worth more than copper but less than gold.

CURRENCY.name: Gold Coin
CURRENCY.description: A valuable gold coin, widely accepted in trade.

CURRENCY.name: Platinum Coin
CURRENCY.description: A rare platinum coin, the highest denomination of standard currency.

CURRENCY.name: Credits
CURRENCY.description: A digital currency used for premium transactions.
